summary: Arrgh. It's horror on the high seas when Scooby-Doo and the gang take a creepy cruise into one of the world's most mysterious places - the legendary Bermuda Triangle.
cast: Frank Welker|Casey Kasem|Mindy Cohn|Grey Griffin|Ron Perlman|Freddy Rodríguez|Tim Conway|Edie McClurg|Kathy Najimy|Arsenio Hall|Dan Castellaneta
keywords: caribbean sea|atlantic ocean|animal character name in title|scooby doo character|pinching cheek
title: ¡Scooby-Doo! ¡Piratas a babor!
